author: Gareth “G” Franklin
description: We do like a pun, especially a tasty pun. Sweet and sour cherry fortified with gin notes and subtle freshening crème de menthe and delicate chocolate.
name: Cherry Springer

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
